sentence.Network_en: When her mother suggested that she stay, Alice willingly acquiesced.
sentence.Network_cn: 当母亲建议她留下时，艾丽斯欣然允之。

sentence.Network_en: Love is a sweet tyranny , because the lover endures his torment willingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱情是甜蜜的暴政, 情人甘心忍受它的折磨.

sentence.Network_en: Many people willingly converted to Buddhism.

entry.def: If someone is willing to do something, they are fairly happy about doing it and will do it if they are asked or required to do it.

example.ex: The military now say they're willing to hold talks with the political parties...
example.tran: 军方现在说，他们愿意与政党进行谈判。

example.ex: There are, of course, questions which she will not be willing to answer.
example.tran: 当然，有些问题是她不愿回答的。

entry.tran: 自愿的;愿意的;积极肯干的
entry.def: Willing is used to describe someone who does something fairly enthusiastically and because they want to do it rather than because they are forced to do it.

example.ex: Have the party on a Saturday, when you can get your partner and other willing adults to help...
example.tran: 把聚会安排在周六，这样你就可以找自己的搭档和其他愿意帮把手的成年人来帮忙了。

example.ex: Although he had had no formal engineering training he was a natural and willing pupil.
example.tran: 虽然他没有接受过正规工科训练，但却是个天生好学的学生。

auth_sentence.content: Turkey, willingly so, is taking the lead.

auth_sentence.content: Mubarak has suggested that he will never willingly step down.

auth_sentence.content: Willingly I will answer your questions for cooperation.

sentences.en: Love is a sweet tyranny,because the lover endures his torment willingly.
sentences.cn: 爱情是甜蜜的暴政,情人甘心忍受它的折磨。

sentences.en: Many people willingly converted to Buddhism.
She would willingly forgo a birthday treat if only her warring parents would declare a truce.
sentences.cn: 只要她的父母停止争吵，她愿意放弃生日宴请。

sentences.en: To keep his job,he willingly subordinated his own interests to the objectives of the company.
sentences.cn: 为了保住工作,他自愿使自己的利益服从公司的目标。
